creator: h.thurow@freenet.de
text:
When loading mod_jk.so (.../tomcat-connectors/jk/binaries/macosx/jk-1.2.25/ppc/mod_jk-1.2.25-httpd-2.2.6.so) 
starting Apache fails with

dyld: lazy symbol binding failed: Symbol not found: _open$UNIX2003
  Referenced from: /usr/local/OPIXweb/apache/modules/mod_jk.so
  Expected in: /usr/lib/libSystem.B.dylib

in the error_log.
Have you tried building this from the source?
creator: markt@apache.org

text:
(In reply to comment #1)
> Have you tried building this from the source?
> 

Yes, after I tried installing it from the binary. Installing it from source was easy going. Thanks.
creator: h.thurow@freenet.de
mturk@apache.org
text:
I'm marking this as WONTFIX sice the solution is to compile the
module from source.
